about_the_game:
After a tragedy in your past, you move to the Cursed Forest to live with monsters. It is there that you are attacked by a succubus. In order to survive her attack, you are able to attain a ring that binds you to her. You must now tame her so that she doesn't drain your life force and kill you.

In order to keep your life force up, you'll need to slay monsters throughout the forest. Slaying them will yield valuable crafting material and gold that you can use to buy and make items at your sole neighbor's home. He will advise you on your situation and help you tame the succubus.

Combat features standard turn-based tactics, offering three classes: Wizard, Soldier, and Assassin. These classes optimize different starting stats, but you can level up and spec your character as you please, while crafting system allows you to experiment with different accessories that grant varying abilities. Play as a glass cannon, an illusionist poisoner, a tank with devastating attack and defense, or mix and match to your style.

The game features an explorable forest with various monsters and bosses, including goblins, minotaurs, trolls, and other mythical monsters.

The game also contains numerous NSFW scenes, fully rendered in 3D.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains explicit sexual encounters with non-consensual or questionable consent, including a scene where a succubus sexually assaults the player character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
